data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Chengde with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Chengde, Hebei, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Chengde, Hebei, China humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the county of Chengde be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Chengde, Hebei, China.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Xinglong
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Xinglong, Hebei, China.
Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Chengde that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Chengde, Hebei, China. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary:
the county of Chengde, Hebei, China has a population of 1,002,100.

We estimate Chengde has 76,020 people who might know Jesus, 16,189 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 909,891 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 1,002,100 people living in Chengde.
